ai-ja329:1.1_0: “For this bad thing the mind used to be encountered,
ai-ja329:1.2_0: Why do you not urge you when something goes?
ai-ja329:1.3_0: Now I go to the forest,
ai-ja329:2.2_0: Blame and praise, happiness and suffering:
ai-ja329:2.3_0: Amongst human beings these things are impermanent,
ai-ja329:3.1_0: “You’re a wise one, a learned one.
ai-ja329:3.3_0: How will I see the branches and leaves?
ai-ja329:3.4_0: the capital of the King’s family - like fire.”
ai-ja329:4.2_0: in a moment I will be free from (of the result).
ai-ja329:5.1_0: a black cast-hair rottting for nine years.
